___________________________________________________________________________________________
___________________________________________________________________________________________


Finetuning I3D on HMDB51 Fold 1 for 30 Epochs (3k iters/epoch) SGD and Cross Entropy 
transform used : Random Crop((224,224)) and RandomHorizontalFlip
Init LR : 0.1
optimizer = optim.SGD(i3d.parameters(), lr=lr, momentum=0.9, weight_decay=0.0000001)
lr_sched = optim.lr_scheduler.StepLR(optimizer, step_size=10, gamma=0.1)
